Game

Class GameRunner

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.GameRunner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GameRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A GameRunner is a Runnable that steps the current game instance forward.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameRunner(Grid grid, javax.swing.JPanel jpanel)
      Creates a GameRunner to work with the given Grid and JPanel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void pause()
      Pauses the running of the game until resume() is called.
      void resume()
      Resumes the running of the game.
      void run() 
      void stop()
      Stops the running of the game.
